title: fragment:pr1-0
content:
**NOTICE: This page is outdated, this will just be used to archive all of my old art. I want to thank everybody for getting me to the point I am today. I'm so happy people appreciated my art even in it's very early stages!**

seriously tho i honest to god hate my old art now i rather be known for my new work

[http://www.scp-wiki.net/the-pastarasta1-art-page-experience-rise-of-the-revenge-of-r This is the new and improved page.]



hello. i am pastarasta1, and i really do like drawing because it is really fun to do. the scp foundation is a good community as has a lot of great things to draw. its also a big part of my life because --i have none-- its inspired me a lot to create things.

anyway, this will be where i upload art and talk about it. i want to thank everyone who has told me that my art was ok. call these my "art highlights". also it will get really opinionated in some spots because i think someone out there cares? idk i care about opinions on the internet a lot and i love it when plp do this.

Epic Huh?

also this is my new youtube channel for my shitposting and art needs: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNUG1Ku-pskfH1SAzgRMlkw

**WARNING: some of my art contains blood and gore and sometimes rlly heavy themes.**

DISCLAMIER: vvvvvvv THIS IS IMPORTANT vvvvvvvv

Here is how to view the images fully and not low quality, as said by Rounderhouse:

> you right click the image and select "copy image location"
> then you put it into your address bar/url bar
> and it will say either
> "m.png" or "m.jpg" at the end
> delete the m
> and then you will have the full image
